title: EntitySave
name: EntitySave
description:
Saves or updates data of the entity and all related entities to the database.
EntitySave(entity, [forceinsert])

arguments.name: entity
arguments.description: Name of the entity that must be saved in the database.

arguments.name: forceInsert
arguments.description: If true, then Lucee always tries to insert the entity as a new record.
